title: Hive Mind
body: If I say anything negative it gets downvoted even if it is true. I find it funny to piss people off on a game board. The white knights who buy 500 dollars worth of skins are really gonna have my ass with downvotes on this {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

replies.body:
0. There's a downvote bot.
0. Perhaps your posts are bad.
0. Nobody cares about how many votes your threads get.

He basically made hate post, blaming people for afking in his games. While he has afk games aswell. 
Thats why people downvoted him xD
It's like he expected a standing ovation for the day's 72nd rant post in PB.

> [{quoted}](name=NF Remilia,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=At2LYBai,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2020-02-15T09:25:11.884+0000)
>
> He basically made hate post, blaming people for afking in his games. While he has afk games aswell. 
> Thats why people downvoted him xD

I dont get banned doing it so Riot doesnt seem to care {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=At2LYBai,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2020-02-15T09:16:32.865+0000)
>
> 0. There's a downvote bot.
> 0. Perhaps your posts are bad.
> 0. Nobody cares about how many votes your threads get.

This is funny {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
Looking at this thread, I think the only butthurt one here is you...

> [{quoted}](name=zPOOPz,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=At2LYBai,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2020-02-15T08:47:48.107+0000)
>
> Looking at this thread, I think the only butthurt one here is you...

Im just having fun here man

Or maybe your posts are shit, opinion based and mainly rant-like?

(And yes, there is hive mind on boards, but its "Riot big bad" one)

> [{quoted}](name=Jng Account,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=At2LYBai,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2020-02-15T08:43:24.749+0000)
>
> Or maybe your posts are shit, opinion based and mainly rant-like?
> 
> (And yes, there is hive mind on boards, but its "Riot big bad" one)

Yeah and you swarm it like flies to shit {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
Your last Thread was downvoted because you blamed people for going afk , but you went afk at one of your last games... So....

> [{quoted}](name=NF Remilia,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=At2LYBai,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2020-02-15T09:14:17.676+0000)
>
> Your last Thread was downvoted because you blamed people for going afk , but you went afk at one of your last games... So....

Well i dont get punished so why not?

How about because - hopefully - you are not a psychopath who can only be kept from doing things that negatively affect others via threat of punishment, but rather someone who is able to recognize the reasons for certain rules to exist and how they benefit the society within which those rules exist as a whole.

Just spitballin' though.
But have you not seen Joker (2019) though?
you shouldn't flaunt your bad behavior here since they could point out your account toward behavior team and it would be a manual review with harsher punishment then one dealt by in game system.
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}} I thought it was mass downvoting by bots.
